title: The Trial of Joe Harlan Junior
description: What would you do if the law failed you? The college Halloween party was supposed to be a night of fun, dress up and laughter, but for Kristy Wise, it quickly became a night of horror.Read the story. Witness the testimony. Is everything that comes after justified?YOU decide.THE TRIAL OF JOE HARLAN JUNIOR IS THE PREQUEL NOVELLA TO J.K. FRANKO'S SHOCKING THRILLER, EYE FOR EYE
author: J.K. Franko
